summary: Custom Armors for made with characters in mind.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Palatino Linotype][color=#d8d8d8][size=4][b][i]
[/i][/b][/size][/color][/font][font=Palatino Linotype][color=#d8d8d8][size=4][b][i]This is the second entry in my "House Armor" series. This time I  focused on Aela the Huntress. Again I wanted to give the armor a unique look, that fit my idea of the character's "class", and I wanted it to look "put together" like it was assembled from various sets. I also wanted keep it compatible with mods which alter her appearance, so I didn't outfit her with it by default, instead you will find it in the display case in her room. The custom armor is the body mesh only, I did this to allow for customization, helmet, gloves, and boots are free to mix and match. Please leave any questions/comments/feedback, and endorse if you enjoy the mod.[/i][/b][/size][/color][/font][font=Palatino Linotype][color=#d8d8d8][size=4][b][i]
[/i][/b][/size][/color][/font][font=Palatino Linotype][color=#953734][size=4][b][i]

Notes:
[/i][/b][/size][/color][/font][font=Palatino Linotype][color=#953734][size=4][b][i]This mod does not alter Aela's NPC form, if you want her to look like my screens, you'll need [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40495/?]this mod[/url]
[/i][/b][/size][/color][/font][font=Palatino Linotype][color=#953734][size=4][b][i]This mod features no textures, to get the exact look in the screens you will to install [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24909/?]Cabal's textures[/url]
[/i][/b][/size][/color][/font][font=Palatino Linotype][color=#953734][size=4][b][i]Depending on you install options, the colors will change, as seen in the screens.
This mod requires the DragonBorn DLC.[/i][/b][/size][/color][/font][font=Palatino Linotype][color=#d8d8d8][size=4][b][i]
[/i][/b][/size][/color][/font][font=Palatino Linotype][color=#d8d8d8][size=4][b][i]
F.A.Q.[/i][/b][/size][/color][/font][font=Palatino Linotype][color=#d8d8d8][size=4][b][i]
[/i][/b][/size][/color][/font][font=Palatino Linotype][color=#d8d8d8][size=4][b][i]
Q. What are House Armors?
[/i][/b][/size][/color][/font][font=Palatino Linotype][color=#d8d8d8][size=4][b][i]A. Just an idea I made up, like in Game of Thrones, each [/i][/b][/size][/color][/font][font=Palatino Linotype][color=#d8d8d8][size=4][b][i]House has it's own sigil, the idea here was to make armors that were handed [/i][/b][/size][/color][/font][font=Palatino Linotype][color=#d8d8d8][size=4][b][i]down, and added to, from person to person within a family, becoming their sigil.[/i][/b][/size][/color][/font][font=Palatino Linotype][color=#d8d8d8][size=4][b][i]
[/i][/b][/size][/color][/font][font=Palatino Linotype][color=#d8d8d8][size=4][b][i]
Q. Can the player use these?
[/i][/b][/size][/color][/font][font=Palatino Linotype][color=#d8d8d8][size=4][b][i]A. Yes, but only within the same gender.[/i][/b][/size][/color][/font][font=Palatino Linotype][color=#d8d8d8][size=4][b][i]
[/i][/b][/size][/color][/font][font=Palatino Linotype][color=#d8d8d8][size=4][b][i]
Q. Why no skimpy G-strings, and high heels?
[/i][/b][/size][/color][/font][font=Palatino Linotype][color=#d8d8d8][size=4][b][i]A. Armour or armor;  a protective covering that is used to prevent damage from being inflicted to an  individual,  by direct contact weapons or projectiles, usually during combat, or from damage caused by a potentially dangerous environment or action.




[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51118/?][img]http://i24.photobucket.com/albums/c18/lfostelr/28692-1-1392662784_zps1b9e3f37.jpg[/img][/url]  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58618/?][img]http://i24.photobucket.com/albums/c18/lfostelr/ffUntitled-1_zps3191279e.jpg[/img][/url][/i][/b][/size][/color][/font][font=Palatino Linotype][color=#d8d8d8][size=4][b][i]
[/i][/b][/size][/color][/font]
author: Foster
